metadata.synopsis: Halsin at party organised by Withers at the very end of the game.The past few months, he's been building a community for people who were dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute created. He's the elder/unofficial leader of this community, which has been founded on the lands that were reclaimed from the Shadow Curse in Act 2. He's at peace now, having found a sense of balance between nature and civilisation that had previously escaped him. He's more comfortable leading this new group than he was as Archdruid, and is looking forward to seeing it prosper. He's also acting as guardian for a number of orphans created by the wars of late.States:The player did not join him at his new community. Halsin catches them up on what he's been doing this past while, and enquires what they've been up to in turn. He's particularly keen to mine some good stories from the player of their recent exploits, that he can entertain his young charges with when he returns to them. This flow could be purely platonic, or have some parts that acknowledge they were old flames.The player did join him at his new community. They arrive at the party together. Halsin shows a little anxiety that the player may regret having opted to live a relatively quiet existence with him, but soon settles in the enjoy the party. This flow is for those who were in a romance with him.

40.speaker: Halsin
40.text: It truly is splendid to see everyone gathered together again, if only for a night. I hope the sun does not make haste to rise on us.

46.speaker: Halsin
46.text: You would think someone of my vintage would be inured to the passage of time, yet these past six months have seemed endless without your company. But now our paths cross once more...
46.context: NodeContext: beaming. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

278.speaker: Player
278.text: Let me guess - 'just as nature intended'?

136.speaker: Halsin
136.text: ... Just as I hoped they would, more like. The Oak Father has been kind to me this past while, yet I cannot forget the bond we all forged together.
136.context: NodeContext: Sincere. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

208.speaker: Halsin
208.text: It is one that can weather any distance, any passage of time. I know it can, for I feel the longing for old friends in my heart each day.
208.context: NodeContext: Sincere. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

322.speaker: Player
322.text: The feeling's mutual. I've missed you.

56.speaker: Halsin
56.text: We have all pined for each other's company, I sense. I cannot imagine otherwise, after what we shared.
56.context: NodeContext: Sincere. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

139.speaker: Halsin
139.text: That bond was forged in a crucible that can never be stoked again, Oak Father willing. It is a bond that can weather any distance, any passage of time.
139.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

39.speaker: Halsin
39.text: I know it can, for I feel the longing for old friends in my heart each day.
39.context: NodeContext: Sincere. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

117.speaker: Player
117.text: You sound like you need a hug.

11.speaker: Halsin
11.text: I always do. Should I ever decline, assume a doppelganger has taken my place.
11.context: NodeContext: 'I  thought you'd never ask!' Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

220.speaker: Halsin
220.text: That was more than worth the wait.
220.context: NodeContext: Post-hug. 'That hit the spot'. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Let's not shortchange ourselves, Halsin. How about a kiss?

347.speaker: Player
347.text: Let's not shortchange ourselves, Halsin. How about a kiss?

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Let's not sell ourselves short, Halsin. How about a kiss?

201.speaker: Halsin
201.text: How thoughtless of me. Come here...
201.context: NodeContext: Romantic/pre-kissArc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

152.speaker: Halsin
152.text: Ah, there it is. That is what I have been missing.
152.context: NodeContext: Post-kiss. Little bit of smouldering intensity. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

43.speaker: Halsin
43.text: Ah, there it is. That is what I have been missing.
43.context: NodeContext: Post-kiss. Little bit of smouldering intensity. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

341.speaker: Halsin
341.text: Now, we have much to catch up on. Do not allow me to ramble on - I am eager to hear all you have been doing.
341.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

101.speaker: Player
101.text: You first, Halsin. I want to hear about the life you've made, the people you've helped.

90.speaker: Halsin
90.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

100.speaker: Halsin
100.text: Our community grows rapidly; in six months, we have turned what was once a shadowy wasteland into a true home for all. In another six months, I would wager the scars of the past will be entirely invisible even to those who remember them.
100.context: NodeContext: Proud. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

107.speaker: Halsin
107.text: The old masonry of Moonrise Towers and Reithwin have been repurposed into new homes, and the land is rich with harvests and bountiful trees. Nature and civilisation are in harmony, stronger together.
107.context: NodeContext: Proud. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

19.speaker: Halsin
19.text: It is, truly... though a more complex, evolving beast than I could ever have anticipated. I spoke often of balance before; only now do I realise that balance is no simple, fixed thing.
19.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

87.speaker: Halsin
87.text: We welcome folk from all walks of life - anyone who wishes for a new start. Naturally, it can be chaotic at times, but it is a thrilling sort of chaos. It thrives in ways I could never have dreamed of.

186.speaker: Player
186.text: I'll need to see this place for myself.

130.speaker: Halsin
130.text: You are welcome whenever you like and for however long as you please.
130.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

10.speaker: Halsin
10.text: As am I. I may age more slowly than most, but I do believe I've gained some new laughter lines of late.
10.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

121.speaker: Halsin
121.text: Now please, tell me all, and spare no details. I shall not lie - I have an ulterior motive in wishing to hear all. It is the children, you see. My charges.
121.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

102.speaker: Halsin
102.text: Please, spare no details. I shall not lie - I have an ulterior motive in wishing to hear all. It is the children, you see. My charges.
102.context: NodeContext: Slightly sheepish confession. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

119.speaker: Halsin
119.text: Their appetite for bedtime tales is greater than I could ever have anticipated: 'Another story, Daddy Halsin, another!' is the chorus that greets me each nightfall.
119.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

241.speaker: Halsin
241.text: They have all but exhausted my repertoire in but a few short months - no mean feat, given the lifetime I have lived. I desperately need new material, please. My reputation is at stake.
241.context: NodeContext: Betraying a hint of 'new parent' weariness. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

253.speaker: Player
253.text: Had I known bedtime tales were a possibility, I'd have sought you out at camp.

95.speaker: Halsin
95.text: Ha! You would ask to be tucked in next. But whatever the intrepid adventurer needed, I would have been glad to provide.
95.context: NodeContext: Playful/indulgent. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

211.speaker: Player
211.text: I expect you'll have a few tales that will need to wait until they are older.

70.speaker: Halsin
70.text: More than a few, I should think. At least I shall be equipped to explain the birds and the bees when the time comes, but I hope that time is quite a while off yet.
70.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

64.speaker: Player
64.text: All right, let me see what I have...

247.speaker: Halsin
247.text: I am all ears. Though I never cared for that phrase. A rather unsettling image...
247.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

330.speaker: Player
330.text: Recall the parable of the Yearning Orphan, your youngest follower and already a great prophet spreading your doctrine...

333.speaker: Player
333.text: Regale Halsin with tales of your past six months.

290.speaker: Player
290.text: Regale Halsin with tales of your past six months.

104.speaker: Halsin
104.text: You have kept yourself busy - I expected no less, in truth.
104.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

15.speaker: Halsin
15.text: I shall be able to keep the children enthralled for a few more nights yet, thanks to you. And should you wish to retell of your exploits in person? Well, I shall not object to a night off.
15.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

301.speaker: Halsin
301.text: Now, it would be cruel of me to hoard you all to myself for the evening, as much as I would like to. I shall leave you to the others for now, unless there was anything else?
301.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

198.speaker: Player
198.text: Tell me how you've been faring - you wanted to form a new settlement, didn't you?

127.speaker: Player
127.text: Tell me about Thaniel and Oliver - do you see much of them?

66.speaker: Halsin
66.text: Quite often - they come and go as they please, but with so many playmates to avail of, they are far from strangers.
66.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

42.speaker: Halsin
42.text: They ask after you often. What you did for them will never be forgotten - I can see it in the land all around me, but more importantly, I see it in their faces whenever they visit.
42.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

193.speaker: Halsin
193.text: To make a child smile is to dabble with the power of gods, as far as I am concerned.
193.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

200.speaker: Player
200.text: Still partial to roaming in bear form, I take it?

125.speaker: Halsin
125.text: I spend half my days in ursine form - the children demand it! I had a score of them taking turns riding upon my back just days ago.
125.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

222.speaker: Halsin
222.text: I am glad they are so comfortable with the Oak Father's creations, but they must learn that not all are as amiable as I am. A lesson for another time though; they deserve some joy.
222.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

169.speaker: Halsin
169.text: As for roaming... that impulse has dwindled, I must admit. Perhaps because I have found where I am meant to be.
169.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

7.speaker: Player
7.text: You seem more settled than I expected of you. I thought that was against your nature.

35.speaker: Halsin
35.text: As did I... but somehow I feel like I no longer need to roam - that I have found something worthy laying roots for.
35.context: NodeContext: Thoughtful/content. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

280.speaker: Halsin
280.text: Amazing, what can be discovered about oneself, even at a ripe old age.
280.context: NodeContext: Thoughtful/content. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

179.speaker: Player
179.text: What of the grove? Do you stay in touch?

325.speaker: Halsin
325.text: On occasion, but I prefer not to interfere. Francesca of the High Forest is Archdruid now, and by all accounts, she has proven to be a steady and wise influence.

265.speaker: Halsin
265.text: Kagha was beyond saving, but the others have a true mentor now. And I am very glad for them.

31.speaker: Halsin
31.text: Even Kagha may yet find true balance, thanks to her influence.

157.speaker: Player
157.text: Do you still want to hear what I have been up to?

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I may have volunteered you for something, if you'll forgive me. Might your new community have room for a well-behaved owlbear?

61.speaker: Halsin
61.text: Do you truly even need to ask? Of course! Who could not open their home to a befeathered hero of Baldur's Gate?
61.context: NodeContext: Delighted. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

351.speaker: Halsin
351.text: And I did promise the children I would bring them back a surprise... imagine their faces.
351.context: NodeContext: Grinning with anticipation. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

18.speaker: Halsin
18.context: NodeContext: Affectionate. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

345.speaker: Halsin
345.text: I could get used to this.
345.context: NodeContext: Affectionate. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

144.speaker: Player
144.text: I wouldn't say no to a kiss.

137.speaker: Halsin
137.context: NodeContext: Romantic. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

9.speaker: Halsin
9.text: I shall never tire of that.
9.context: NodeContext: Post-kiss. Romantic. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

215.speaker: Player
215.text: I wouldn't say no to a kiss.

197.speaker: Halsin
197.text: Before you go, I have something for you - just a little keepsake really. Do you remember how I told you I like to whittle? I made this...
197.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin produces a small wooden duck from his inventory, holding it in front of him with two hands while he describes it to the playerInternalNodeContext: Halsin transfers carved duck to player NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

360.speaker: Halsin
360.text: Ducks are my favourite, but I thought they were particularly fitting in this case. They are migratory birds of course, travelling far and wide with the turn of the seasons.
360.context: CinematicNodeContext: Halsin holds duck in front of him as he describes itNodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

82.speaker: Halsin
82.text: Yet they always find their way back to where they belong, just like old friends find themselves back in each other's company.
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player takes duck from Halsin (receive inventory)NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

279.speaker: Halsin
279.text: No. It's wooden. I suppose it burns if you find yourself in dire need of kindling, but I hope it does not come to that.
279.context: NodeContext: Amused/bemusd. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

287.speaker: Halsin
287.text: Just a token to remember me by. Now I've taken up enough of your time - go on, enjoy the festivities. We can speak again later.
287.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

277.speaker: Player
277.text: You're a sentimental creature at heart, you know that?

159.speaker: Halsin
159.text: Oh, I am well aware, trust me. Now I've taken up enough of your time - go on, enjoy the festivities.
159.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

306.speaker: Player
306.text: This may fetch a modest price from a merchant with poor taste.

60.speaker: Halsin
60.text: Well... that is your choice to make, of course. Though I hope the sentimental value may win out over the temptation of a few coppers...
60.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

88.speaker: Halsin
88.text: Now I've taken up enough of your time - go on, enjoy the festivities. We can speak again later.
88.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

55.speaker: Player
55.text: The truth may be a little flat. Spice it up a little.

231.speaker: Halsin
231.text: You are truly incapable of disappointing. The children shall be rapt - and have no fear; all due credit shall be given to the tale's originator.
231.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

143.speaker: Halsin
143.text: Hmm, do I detect a certain... exaggeration? You could give Master Geddarm a run for his gold - though I suppose he has little need for it now, Oak Father bless him.
143.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

266.speaker: Halsin
266.text: In any case, my audience will favour a good tale over veracity any day - I thank you for your offering.
266.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

337.speaker: Player
337.text: The truth may be a little flat. Spice it up a little.

309.speaker: Player
309.text: Tell Halsin of how you consolidated your power over Lady Shar's church, purging the disloyal with bloody vigor.

357.speaker: Halsin
357.text: My. Perhaps a tale for the older children, once I trim off a few of the... less savoury details. But thank you, all the same.
357.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

192.speaker: Player
192.text: Tell Halsin of how you've roamed far and wide, now that you are free of Shar.

206.speaker: Halsin
206.text: The shadows were concealing a true adventurer's heart then. Thank you - the children shall be rapt.
206.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

284.speaker: Player
284.text: Regale Halsin with tales of your tranquil life with your family and coterie of animals.

34.speaker: Halsin
34.text: Yes, I thought I caught the scent of a wolf upon the wind... the children shall love this, but be warned - they may insist upon a visit.
34.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

255.speaker: Player
255.text: Regale Halsin with tales of your tranquil life with your family and coterie of animals.

180.speaker: Halsin
180.text: Yes, I thought I caught the scent of a wolf upon the wind... the children shall love this, but be warned - they may insist upon a visit.
180.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

317.speaker: Player
317.text: I've been at something of a loose end - roaming and adventuring as I see fit.

219.speaker: Halsin
219.text: Countless tales have begun with a roaming adventurer - I am sure I shall keep the children enthralled for years to come with your exploits. Thank you.
219.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

22.speaker: Player
22.text: I have ridden a red dragon to battle as a Warrior of the Comet. The lich queen Vlaakith will fall by my hand.

217.speaker: Halsin
217.text: Oak Father preserve you - I hope you have a tight hold on the beast. But this shall make for a most stirring tale for the children. I may even have to tone down the details, for fear they get too excited...
217.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

78.speaker: Player
78.text: Most of my days are spent with Shadowheart. It is... peaceful. But I venture forth at times to hunt down the lich queen's assassins. The worms feast on their corpses.

188.speaker: Halsin
188.text: Ha! I think some of the more bloodthirsty children will relish this, thank you.
188.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

344.speaker: Player
344.text: I have travelled the harshest lands of the Sword Coast, piercing the hearts of the lich queen's countless assassins.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I've been researching the tale of the first Blackstaff, Khelben Arunsun. My abridged notes would make for a fascinating bedtime story.

303.speaker: Halsin
303.text: I see... well I trust your sources, of course. Perhaps the historical record can survive an embellishment or two, for the sake of the children. In any case, you have my gratitude.
303.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

182.speaker: Player
182.text: What haven't I done? Delved into dungeons, read secret tomes, taken out a rogue shadow mage or two. Enough magic and mystery for a treasury of tales.

226.speaker: Halsin
226.text: Why, Master Dekarios, I had no idea you would continue to stoke the fires of adventure. I commend you - as shall the children, once they hear of your exploits. Thank you.
226.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

342.speaker: Player
342.text: Tell him of the tribulations of godhood. The politics, the bureaucracy, the endless prayers to answer...

148.speaker: Halsin
148.text: Well luckily for you, mortals have a habit of embellishing their run-ins with gods... I am sure I can muster something to captivate the children from what I can glean of you.
148.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

319.speaker: Player
319.text: I embraced my hellish side and dedicated my life to rebuilding the grand city of Baldur's Gate.

98.speaker: Halsin
98.text: The makings of the multi-night epic. The children shall rush to their bunks in order to hear the next chapter, thank you.
98.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

45.speaker: Player
45.text: I turned from my hellish past and dedicated my life to rebuilding the grand city of Baldur's Gate.

172.speaker: Halsin
172.text: A noble calling. Your tale shall inspire a whole generation. Thank you.
172.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

327.speaker: Player
327.text: The Sword Coast is safe as ever thanks to the Blade and his infernal powers.

191.speaker: Halsin
191.text: The classic tale of the Blade, but with a twist? This shall go down very well with the children, I sense. Thank you.
191.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

27.speaker: Player
27.text: The Blade of Frontiers is back on the hunt. The Sword Coast is safe as ever.

318.speaker: Halsin
318.text: Many of the children have already heard of you, as it were - do you know some of them scarcely even believe this old bear could be acquainted with such a hero?
318.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

160.speaker: Halsin
160.text: But the authentic sense that your recollections bring to the tale shall win them over, no doubt. Thank you.
160.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

315.speaker: Player
315.text: No hellbeast is safe from the Blade of Avernus and his infernal powers.

268.speaker: Halsin
268.text: Thank you, the children shall be agog. I do believe some of them use the number of beastly fangs and claws present in a tale as the yardstick for its quality - which puts yours right at the top of the heap.
268.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

181.speaker: Player
181.text: The Blade of Avernus is on the hunt. The Hells shudder at the very mention of his name.

267.speaker: Halsin
267.text: A classic tale. I expect it shall inspire more than a few of the children to start practising their ripostes with wooden sticks.
267.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

246.speaker: Player
246.text: The Blade of Avernus and his companion are on the hunt. No hellbeast is safe from his infernal powers.

3.speaker: Halsin
3.text: A formidable duo. I am glad that you and Karlach have each other - it shall serve as a strong lesson for the children, as well as a stirring tale.
3.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

262.speaker: Player
262.text: The Blade of Avernus and his companion are on the hunt. The Hells shudder at the very mention of his name.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Avernus has proven, ahem, lively - but at least I have Karlach by my side. Her laugh parts the clouds.

0.speaker: Halsin
0.text: I am glad you and Karlach have an enduring friendship - it shall serve as a strong lesson for the children, as well as a stirring tale.
0.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

295.speaker: Player
295.text: I've been revelling in my freedom, rediscovering the joys of the night.

25.speaker: Halsin
25.text: Sanguine joys, no doubt? Perhaps I shall smoothen out some of those details - the children do not need to know the full truth of your diet. But they shall be rapt all the same, thank you.
25.context: NodeContext: Impressed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

118.speaker: Player
118.text: Halsin, I've been hiding in sewers and eating rats. It's not a glorious tale.

16.speaker: Halsin
16.text: Ah, but the glory can be found in the telling. The children love tales of underdogs, facing odds most unlikely. They shall appreciate your story, trust me.
16.context: NodeContext: Unfazed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

86.speaker: Player
86.text: My tales are a little heavy on murder and sex. But if the children want to hear them...

161.speaker: Halsin
161.text: Hmm. Perhaps I can substitute the bloodlust and... eh, general lust for cuddles and animals in the retelling. The children may be confused, but no matter - they will soon be asleep.
161.context: NodeContext: Unfazed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

232.speaker: Halsin
232.text: Even with a few little white lies, rest assured that they shall be engrossed. Thank you.
232.context: NodeContext: Unfazed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

158.speaker: Player
158.text: Tell him of how you lost your horn.

310.speaker: Halsin
310.text: Truly? I never would have guessed that is what happened. And to think I believed I had the measure of you... but I am glad to be wrong - the children shall be captivated.
310.context: NodeContext: Surprised, Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

112.speaker: Player
112.text: Tell Halsin a detective story, where in the end, the intrepid Fist discovers they had been committing the murders all along.

170.speaker: Halsin
170.text: A touch bleak perhaps, but considering the amount of orphans in my audience, I am sure they shall manage.
170.context: NodeContext: Unfazed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

71.speaker: Halsin
71.text: I can make something palatable with a little showmanship and creative licence - thank you.
71.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

263.speaker: Player
263.text: My exploits have been limited by my new form. I live as a pariah, feared by most.

151.speaker: Halsin
151.text: Yet not by me. I shall tell the children of your heroism and sacrifice. They shall know what they owe to you, trust me.
151.context: NodeContext: Unfazed. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

32.speaker: Player
32.text: I have been dwelling far from the public eye. Yet the Emperor and I have grand plans in motion - that I cannot speak of.

209.speaker: Halsin
209.text: Too murky for a children's tale, I fear. Perhaps I should focus on the hero you were, and the sacrifice you made. But thank you for sharing, nonetheless.
209.context: NodeContext: Unsure but appreciative, Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

73.speaker: Player
73.text: My new form demands discretion. I have been amassing power in the shadows with my ally, the emperor.

361.speaker: Halsin
361.text: I see. Perhaps the children can learn something from your ambition in the face of adversity. Thank you.
361.context: NodeContext: Unsure but appreciative, Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

74.speaker: Player
74.text: My exploits have been limited by my new form. I live as a pariah, feared by most.

83.speaker: Halsin
83.text: And with an appetite for the grey ambrosia that dwells within every skull, I presume? Perhaps I shall remind the children of your heroism and self-sacrifice... and skip over the brain-eating until they are older.
83.context: NodeContext: Unsure but appreciative, Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

329.speaker: Player
329.text: Well, I have developed a taste for togas, for one thing.

234.speaker: Player
234.text: Recount some of your recent exploits, sparing no detail.

228.speaker: Player
228.text: Recount some of your recent exploits, sparing no detail.

59.speaker: Halsin
59.text: I am glad you have kept yourself occupied. No doubt I will be able to spin a few yarns from the children from this. Thank you.
59.context: NodeContext: Appreciative, Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

302.speaker: Player
302.text: Recount fighting along side Lae'zel against the forces of Vlaakith.

252.speaker: Halsin
252.text: Lae'zel could not have wished for a finer companion by her side. You truly love her, I can tell. Just keep each other safe, please.

153.speaker: Halsin
153.text: Lae'zel is truly blessed to have you by her side. Just keep each other safe, please.

272.speaker: Player
272.text: Recount fighting along side Karlach against the devils and demons.

207.speaker: Halsin
207.text: Karlach is truly lucky to have you in her life - even the Hells themselves cannot dim the love you share.

53.speaker: Halsin
53.text: Karlach is truly lucky to have you by her side. The Hells will never daunt the pair of you, I'll wager.

164.speaker: Player
164.text: Is this the balance you wished for?

63.speaker: Halsin
63.text: In a manner of speaking, yes... Though it is a more complex, evolving beast than I could ever have anticipated. True balance is no simple, fixed thing. I see that now.
63.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

236.speaker: Halsin
236.text: Of course. Disagreements, friction, opposing cultures, and our fair share of petty nonsense that I shall not bore you with. It is to be expected, wherever people gather to make a life for themselves.
236.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

105.speaker: Halsin
105.text: And in truth, I think I am better able to help them navigate it than I ever was as Archdruid of the Grove. I am wiser perhaps, but I am certainly happier. Hardships are rare and diminished when you are where you truly want to be.
105.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

307.speaker: Player
307.text: I recall you have quite a few young wards to care for - nine wagons of them, wasn't it?

245.speaker: Halsin
245.text: Ah, my greatest purpose, and greatest reward. Those children have been through more than fate had any right to cast at them, and yet they go on, as resilient as anything in nature.
245.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

305.speaker: Halsin
305.text: I impart what knowledge I can to them, yet in truth they teach me far more. The land we saved is theirs, and they will cherish it, I am sure. Thaniel and Oliver shall never want for friends ever again.
305.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

51.speaker: Player
51.text: I could listen to you talk all day, but if you insist.

323.speaker: Player
323.text: Finally. Yes, let's talk about me.

93.speaker: Player
93.text: I don't want to talk about it.

165.speaker: Halsin
165.text: I shall not push the matter if you are not comfortable. I can tell you how I have been faring, if you wish?
165.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

270.speaker: Halsin
270.text: Ah, as you wish. Enjoy yourself.

356.speaker: Player
356.text: Stay eager a little longer - I'll come back to you later.

298.speaker: Halsin
298.text: Ah, there it is. That is what I have been missing.
298.context: NodeContext: Post-kiss. Little bit of smouldering intensity. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

297.speaker: Halsin
297.text: Ah, there it is. That is what I have been missing.
297.context: NodeContext: Post-kiss. Little bit of smouldering intensity. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

141.speaker: Halsin
141.text: Ah, there it is. That is what I have been missing.
141.context: NodeContext: Post-kiss. Little bit of smouldering intensity. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

292.speaker: Player
292.text: Let's not shortchange ourselves, Halsin. How about a kiss?

174.speaker: Halsin
174.text: That was more than worth the wait... oh, I suppose you didn't mean that literally.
174.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

202.speaker: Player
202.text: I'm sure there'll be more where that came from.

251.speaker: Halsin
251.text: Rest assured, my arms shall be ready.
251.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Ooffh, that's quite a squeeze you put on me, Halsin.

216.speaker: Halsin
216.text: Apologies. You can probably understand my eagerness. I shall be as gentle as a feather next time.
216.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

258.speaker: Player
258.text: You sound like you need a drink.

320.speaker: Halsin
320.text: Well, I am not normally given to imbibing, but this is a special occasion, and I believe our dear Withers procured a fine honey mead as part of the celebratory victuals...
320.context: NodeContext: Could be tempted. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

269.speaker: Halsin
269.text: Even the most ascetic of nature's servants would be tempted by such an elixir... But that can wait. Your company is what truly drew me.
269.context: NodeContext: Could be tempted. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

177.speaker: Player
177.text: That's life, I'm afraid. We can't go back.

132.speaker: Halsin
132.text: True, we cannot. But we can make a future that bests even the fondest of memories. Then, each reunion shall be all the sweeter.
132.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

348.speaker: Halsin
348.text: And who is to say we need to make such gatherings a rare occasion? My hearth is yours to warm yourself beside, always.
348.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

113.speaker: Player
113.text: The future's ours to write. Who knows what we might yet share together.

126.speaker: Halsin
126.text: You are right, of course. I am accustomed to dwelling on the past, even when it brought me nothing but unhappiness. You changed that, and gave me the most precious of memories.
126.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

13.speaker: Halsin
13.text: Now the task is to make yet more of them, so that each reunion shall be all the sweeter.
13.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

308.speaker: Halsin
308.text: Perhaps that is so for you, but for me? It may be that a peaceful life after so many years of tumult has made me sentimental.
308.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

288.speaker: Halsin
288.text: I dwell upon what we shared: that bond was forged in a crucible that can never be stoked again, Oak Father willing. It is a bond that can weather any distance, any passage of time.
288.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player did not go with him however, and now they are reuniting at a celebration. This may be purely platonic, or as old flames

359.speaker: Player
359.text: You sound almost sentimental, considering we didn't really get along.

94.speaker: Halsin
94.text: Our differences are insignificant compared to our shared experiences and achievements. We are a rare breed - we should let bygones be bygones.

166.speaker: Player
166.text: Very well then... how are you?

48.speaker: Halsin
48.text: I was just about to ask the same of you - I'll admit I am curious to hear how you have been occupying your days.

349.speaker: Player
349.text: I suppose you'll want a hug or something.

77.speaker: Halsin
77.text: It would not go amiss, if you are willing.

276.speaker: Halsin
276.text: See, that was scarcely a hardship for either of us, was it? Now tell me, what have you been up to this past while?

178.speaker: Player
178.text: I'm quite happy with the status quo. Enjoy your evening, and don't talk about bark and moss too much.

346.speaker: Halsin
346.text: In that case, nothing more needs to be said. Farewell.

185.speaker: Player
185.text: I am sorry, for vanishing like I did. Karlach needed me.

26.speaker: Halsin
26.text: And she is lucky to have you. Just as I was, for the time we shared.

162.speaker: Halsin
162.text: Our love was always unbound - free to flow where greater forces would dictate. And still, you have found yourself here before me once again, if only for a night.

233.speaker: Halsin
233.text: So do as you must, and see where the path takes you. My door and heart will both remain open to you, always.

147.speaker: Player
147.text: I apologise for my sudden departure before - my people needed me.

199.speaker: Halsin
199.text: Do not apologise for following your true course. You did what was necessary, to help those who needed it.

195.speaker: Halsin
195.text: I was eager to attend tonight... yet I cannot help but fear that it may be a mistake. Do you know what I speak of?
195.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little concern, like a parent's first night out away from the new baby. ,Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

99.speaker: Halsin
99.text: All these months, and I haven't been away from what we built together. There's a whole community out in Thaniel's realm that has never known a day without our presence.
99.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little concern, like a parent's first night out away from the new baby. ,Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

257.speaker: Halsin
257.text: Being away from it... I cannot help but worry how they will fare in our absence.
257.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little concern, like a parent's first night out away from the new baby. ,Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: We'll be back before they know it.

89.speaker: Halsin
89.text: I hope so. The children shall miss their bedtime tale tonight - though perhaps I can glean a few new stories from our friends here, to make up for it.
89.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little concern, like a parent's first night out away from the new baby. ,Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

69.speaker: Halsin
69.text: Tell me... are you happy with the path we tread together? I took you from a life of high adventure, to one  that can be described as anything but.
69.context: NodeContext: Reflective. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

24.speaker: Halsin
24.text: I thought perhaps that seeing everyone once again, and hearing of all that they have been doing... it might awaken some regret, about the life we lead. You could have done anything, gone with anyone... yet you chose me.
24.context: NodeContext: Reflective. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: I chose you for a reason, and have never looked back.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: We're adults - the odd regret is normal. Doesn't mean I'm not happy.

176.speaker: Halsin
176.text: I am glad to hear it. Forgive an old fool in need of a little reassurance. I am still expecting to stir from the dream.
176.context: NodeContext: Relieved. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

244.speaker: Player
244.text: Don't be silly. You're adorable when you're nervous. Like a big puppy, anxious where his next petting will come from.

242.speaker: Halsin
242.text: Forgive me. This past while has been so idyllic that I almost fear something must go wrong. A fear I shall overcome, trust me. We are amongst friends, in celebration.
242.context: NodeContext: Relieved. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

328.speaker: Player
328.text: About us? Never. But if this party proves to be fun, I think we'll all have a few regrets come morning.

286.speaker: Halsin
286.text: You jest, but I caught the scent of some honey mead as we arrived - even I may be tempted to indulge a little.
286.context: NodeContext: Relieved. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

140.speaker: Halsin
140.text: It is a special occasion after all. Just haul me away should you find me bare-chested and singing the songs of my ancestors.
140.context: NodeContext: Small shrug. 'Why not?' Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

223.speaker: Halsin
223.text: You must be eager to speak to some of the others. I shall be fine - do not allow me to keep you.
223.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

293.speaker: Player
293.text: All right. Go on and enjoy yourself. I'll find you later.
293.context: InternalNodeContext: FLAGGED FOR INITIAL FLOW ONLY. BLOCKED FOR HASMET.

273.speaker: Halsin
273.text: Be sure to take your own advice - this is a special night, for all of us.
273.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Promise me you won't be modest about all you've achieved when you're talking to people.

41.speaker: Halsin
41.text: It is not for me to boast - it was a shared effort to reclaim the stones of Moonrise and Reithwin, and build something new. I am just lucky to be a part of it.
41.context: NodeContext: Humble. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Be proud of your achievements, Halsin. So many people have a fresh start only because of you.

326.speaker: Halsin
326.text: Myself included - we have all shared in this bounty. But I take your point, and shall acknowledge my role. In brief.
326.context: NodeContext: Conceding a little. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

204.speaker: Player
204.text: Shared effort? I saw you shift masonry that three grown men couldn't budge. You built a whole schoolhouse in a day!

131.speaker: Halsin
131.text: Well, these arms are not just for show. And it was an easy task to throw myself into - after so much destruction, I relished building something.
131.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

108.speaker: Player
108.text: Fine - I'll boast on your behalf, and enjoy watching your cheeks turn apple-red.

171.speaker: Halsin
171.text: Hmm, perhaps I shall have to take the form of a mouse and hide myself away.
171.context: NodeContext: Embarassed/joking, Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

75.speaker: Halsin
75.text: I appreciate the nudging, all the same. We serve as a good pair, you and I.
75.context: NodeContext: Conceding a little. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: Might I trouble you for a hug?

243.speaker: Player
243.text: I may have volunteered us for something, if you'll forgive me. Might we have room for a well-behaved owlbear?

314.speaker: Player
314.text: I wouldn't say no to a kiss.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: Be sure to mention Oliver and Thaniel - people will be eager to hear how they're faring, no doubt.

33.speaker: Halsin
33.text: Of course. Seeing them free and happy may be my proudest achievement - and now they have more playmates than they could ever wish for.
33.context: NodeContext: Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: Honestly, I was expecting you to be the one with regrets - don't you miss roaming free?

355.speaker: Halsin
355.text: I thought I would... but in truth, no. Roaming has lost its lustre now that I have somewhere I truly belong.
355.context: NodeContext: Content/thoughtful, Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

124.speaker: Halsin
124.text: Perhaps my true nature was waiting to reveal itself, with your aid. I just hope you share in my contentment.
124.context: NodeContext: Content/thoughtful, Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

145.speaker: Player
145.text: I have no regrets in any case. I chose a life with you, and haven't looked back.

122.speaker: Player
122.text: It's out of our hands. We can't always be there.

354.speaker: Halsin
354.text: You are right, of course. What we have made shall outgrow us both, and Oak Father willing, stand as our legacy...
354.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little concern, like a parent's first night out away from the new baby. ,Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

173.speaker: Player
173.text: They'll survive, and you deserve a change of scenery.

282.speaker: Halsin
282.text: I just hope the children get by without me there for their bedtime stories...
282.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little concern, like a parent's first night out away from the new baby. ,Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

114.speaker: Player
114.text: I'm not worried in the slightest. I've needed this.

334.speaker: Halsin
334.text: Then I shall take courage from your example.
334.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little concern, like a parent's first night out away from the new baby. ,Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: If you're worried about neglecting your duties back home, don't be - they'll manage for one night.

221.speaker: Halsin
221.text: Oh, to have your confidence. You must think me like a mother hen...
221.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little concern, like a parent's first night out away from the new baby. ,Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

156.speaker: Player
156.text: We're right where we ought to be - amongst old friends.

54.speaker: Halsin
54.text: Of course. I have just become unaccustomed to free time, perhaps. I feel like I am neglecting something.
54.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little concern, like a parent's first night out away from the new baby. ,Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

340.speaker: Player
340.text: Give it a little while - and your fears will be long forgotten.

128.speaker: Halsin
128.text: You are right. Perhaps I am simply out of practice.
128.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little concern, like a parent's first night out away from the new baby. ,Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

249.speaker: Halsin
249.text: You cannot bear to be apart from me, I see?

115.speaker: Halsin
115.text: Oh no, perish the thought. I can bearly imagine stooping to such bear-faced pun-mongering.
115.context: NodeContext: Teasing. Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

91.speaker: Halsin
91.text: The childrens' sense of humour is rubbing off on me, perhaps...
91.context: NodeContext: 'alright, you got me' Arc: Halsin spent the past few months building a new community for people left dispossessed by the upheaval the Absolute called. The player is in a relationship with him and has been staying with him at his new community. They arrived at the celebration together.

321.speaker: Player
321.text: Speaking of jokes, did you hear what the amorous boar said to the sow...?

96.speaker: Halsin
96.text: 'Fancy a b-oink?' Indeed; you'll be hard-pressed to find a joke I haven't... oh.
96.context: NodeContext: Amused at first, in response to a joke he's heard before. Trails off at the end as he remembers something

52.speaker: Halsin
52.text: Tusk - a boar, back in the grove. I had promised to help find him a mate before we embarked on our quest, but with all that transpired... I forgot.

213.speaker: Halsin
213.text: Come morning I shall write a letter of enquiry as to his condition. A promise is a promise - Tusk shall have his mate.

338.speaker: Halsin
338.context: NodeContext: Content/enjoying himself at a parrty

109.speaker: Player
109.text: I have a joke for you - did you hear what the amorous boar said to the sow...?
